description: L5 학술·연구 마스터리 2차 - 학술 심화/국제협력/연구윤리 (CEFR C1-C2 완성)

stages.title: 학제간 연구 협력
stages.intent: 다양한 학문 분야 간의 협력 연구를 기획하고 조율하여 통합적 접근을 실현한다.
lexset: interdisciplinary, multidisciplinary, collaboration, integration, synergy, convergence, holistic, perspective, methodology, framework

seeds.kr: 학제간 접근이 복잡한 문제 해결에 필수적입니다.
seeds.en: An interdisciplinary approach is essential for solving complex problems.
Experts from various fields are collaborating.
We analyze the phenomenon from an integrated perspective.

seeds.kr: 학문 간 경계를 넘나드는 연구가 증가하고 있습니다.
seeds.en: Research that crosses disciplinary boundaries is increasing.
This is a collaborative project where synergistic effects are expected.
Convergence research presents new paradigms.
This is a research area that requires a holistic approach.
A multidisciplinary team has been formed.
An integrated methodology needs to be developed.
Breaking down academic boundaries is important.

stages.title: 국제 학술 협력
stages.intent: 국제적 학술 협력을 통해 글로벌 연구 네트워크를 구축하고 문화 간 이해를 증진한다.
lexset: international, global, cooperation, collaboration, exchange, network, partnership, mobility, diversity, cultural

seeds.en: International joint research is expanding.
We have established a global academic network.

seeds.kr: 문화 간 이해가 연구에 중요한 역할을 합니다.
seeds.en: Cross-cultural understanding plays an important role in research.
Academic exchange is actively taking place.
Diversity enhances the quality of research.
International partnerships have been formed.
Researcher mobility is increasing.
We jointly respond to global challenges.
Cross-border cooperation is important.
This is research that respects cultural diversity.

stages.title: 연구 영향력 및 사회적 기여
stages.intent: 연구의 사회적 영향력을 평가하고 학술 연구가 사회에 기여하는 방안을 모색한다.
lexset: impact, influence, contribution, transfer, engagement, outreach, dissemination, application, benefit, society

seeds.en: We assess the impact of research on society.
Knowledge transfer is an important goal of research.
Communication with the public should be strengthened.
We return research results to society.
The practical value of academic research is important.
Social engagement enhances research quality.
Research results should be widely disseminated.
Connection between academia and industry is necessary.

seeds.kr: 공공 정책에 연구가 기여할 수 있습니다.
seeds.en: Research can contribute to public policy.
Academia plays a role in solving social problems.

stages.title: 학술 리더십 및 멘토링 (Bridge)
stages.intent: 학술 공동체에서 리더십을 발휘하고 후진을 양성하는 멘토링 역할을 수행한다.
lexset: leadership, mentoring, guidance, development, cultivation, community, legacy, succession, inspiration, empowerment

seeds.en: Academic leadership is important for community development.
We are mentoring junior researchers.
Academic traditions must be inherited and developed.
We create an inspiring research environment.
Cultivating next-generation scholars is important.
The cohesion of the academic community should be strengthened.
Knowledge transmission is our responsibility.
We play a role in leading research culture.
We pass on academic legacy to the next generation.
We build a collaborative research environment.

stages.title: 연구 데이터 관리 및 공유
stages.intent: 연구 데이터를 체계적으로 관리하고 학술 공동체와 투명하게 공유한다.
lexset: data, management, sharing, transparency, reproducibility, accessibility, preservation, archive, repository, metadata

seeds.en: Research data must be systematically managed.
Data sharing contributes to scientific advancement.
Transparency ensures research credibility.
Reproducibility is a core principle of science.
We have established a data repository.
Metadata has been properly documented.
Data accessibility should be improved.
Long-term preservation strategies are needed.
We continuously manage data quality.
Open science is being promoted.

stages.title: 학술 출판 및 동료심사
stages.intent: 학술 출판 과정을 이해하고 동료심사 시스템에 능동적으로 참여한다.
lexset: publishing, publication, peer-review, editorial, manuscript, journal, revision, acceptance, rejection, impact

seeds.en: The paper has been published after peer review.
We revised it reflecting the editor's feedback.
The reviewer's comments were constructive.
The journal's impact is increasing.
Publishing ethics must be observed.
Open access publishing is spreading.
Citation indices are used for research evaluation.
The quality of manuscripts is continuously improving.
Scholarly communication has been digitized.
Transparency in the review process is important.

stages.title: 연구비 획득 및 관리
stages.intent: 연구비를 성공적으로 획득하고 효율적으로 관리하여 연구 목표를 달성한다.
lexset: funding, grant, budget, allocation, resource, proposal, application, award, management, efficiency

seeds.en: We have submitted a grant application.
The budget must be allocated efficiently.
Research resources are being utilized appropriately.
We maintain transparency in fund management.
Grant acquisition was successful.
We regularly monitor budget execution.
The quality of research proposals is important.
Various funding sources must be secured.
We comply with research fund management regulations.
Performance-based evaluation is being implemented.

stages.title: 학술 네트워킹 및 컨퍼런스 (Bridge)
stages.intent: 학술 네트워크를 구축하고 국제 컨퍼런스에서 효과적으로 소통한다.
lexset: networking, conference, symposium, workshop, collaboration, connection, relationship, exchange, interaction, community

seeds.en: We are actively building academic networks.
We are scheduled to present at an international conference.
We have strengthened collaborative relationships with colleagues.
Academic exchange is helpful for research.
Networking with experts is important.
We obtained valuable information from the workshop.
We maintain connections with the academic community.
Knowledge sharing is mutually beneficial.
The international collaboration network has expanded.
Participation in academic events broadens perspectives.

stages.title: 미래 연구 동향 및 예측
stages.intent: 학술 분야의 미래 동향을 분석하고 연구 발전 방향을 예측한다.
lexset: trend, prediction, forecasting, emerging, future, evolution, advancement, innovation, transformation, paradigm

seeds.kr: 미래 연구 동향을 예측하는 것이 중요합니다.
seeds.en: Predicting future research trends is important.
Emerging fields are developing rapidly.

seeds.kr: 기술 발전이 연구 방식을 변화시키고 있습니다.
seeds.en: Technological advancement is changing research methods.
A paradigm shift is anticipated.
Academic evolution continues.
Innovative approaches are required.
The research ecosystem is transforming.
We must prepare for future challenges.
The convergence of academic fields is accelerating.
Predictive modeling is becoming more sophisticated.

stages.title: 연구 혁신 및 창의성
stages.intent: 연구에서 창의적 사고를 발휘하고 혁신적 접근법을 개발한다.
lexset: innovation, creativity, novel, breakthrough, original, pioneering, revolutionary, groundbreaking, inventive, ingenious

seeds.en: We have developed innovative research methods.
Creative thinking provides breakthroughs.
Original approaches open new possibilities.
Groundbreaking discoveries are expected.
Pioneering research leads the field.
Revolutionary change has begun.
Creativity is the core driving force of research.
We present a new paradigm.
Originality enhances academic value.
Innovative ideas must be implemented.

stages.title: 학술적 비판적 사고
stages.intent: 학술 정보를 비판적으로 분석하고 논리적 추론을 통해 결론을 도출한다.
lexset: critical, analytical, logical, reasoning, evaluation, assessment, skepticism, scrutiny, examination, judgment

seeds.en: Critical thinking is fundamental to research.
We reached conclusions through logical reasoning.
This is a problem that requires an analytical approach.
It should be examined from a skeptical perspective.
Rigorous verification is required.
Judgment is a core ability of researchers.
We improve through critical evaluation.
Logical consistency must be maintained.
Analytical thinking adds depth.
Critical review ensures quality.

stages.title: 학술 유산 및 지속가능성 (Bridge)
stages.intent: 학술적 유산을 보존하고 지속가능한 연구 문화를 구축한다.
lexset: legacy, heritage, sustainability, preservation, continuity, tradition, succession, perpetuation, conservation, endurance

seeds.kr: 학술적 유산을 다음 세대에 전수해야 합니다.
seeds.en: Academic legacy must be passed on to the next generation.
We are building a sustainable research culture.
Academic traditions must be preserved while being developed.
Continuity of research is important.
The perpetuity of knowledge must be ensured.
Academic values must be preserved.
Sustainability of research culture is necessary.
Academic succession is taking place.
Balance between tradition and innovation is important.
Academic legacy is humanity's asset.
